LanguageData.RPP_Production_Component.label: make robotic component
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Component.description: Produce Robotic Components which are used as logic circuits within a Robotic Matrix.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_I.label: make robotic matrix (Simple)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_I.description: Produce a tier-1 robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot that has a workskill of 4.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_II.label: make robotic matrix (Basic)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_II.description: Produce a tier-2 robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot that has a workskill of 8.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_III.label: make robotic matrix (Intermediate)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_III.description: Produce a tier-3 robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot that has a workskill of 13.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_IV.label: make robotic matrix (Advanced)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_IV.description: Produce a tier-4 robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot that has a workskill of 16.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_V.label: make robotic matrix (Anti-Logic)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_V.description: Produce a tier-5 Anti-Logic Matrix for crafting a robot that has a workskill of 20.\nNP=P
